snippet.title: Homebound - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Sophie is a young girl staying home during COVID-19. Isolated from her friends, she must use her colorful imagination to entertain herself.

Play make-believe minigames to brighten up your mood and stave off the boredom!

Download for PC: https://ben-seavello.itch.io/homebound

~~

Homebound is a short game which began as an entry for the 34th GM48 game jam in collaboration with Giraffe. After the jam, I decided to rebuild the game, fleshing it out and polishing it up. I hope that this short game can bring you some joy! Thank you for playing, and stay safe.
